title: 87/485/EEC: Council Decision of 28 September 1987 concerning the conclusion of the International Coffee Agreement 1983
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 28 September 1987 concerning the  conclusion of the International Coffee Agreement 1983 (87/485/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The International Coffee Agreement 1983 is hereby approved on behalf of the European  Economic Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to Decision 83/539/EEC.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the person empowered to  deposit the instrument of approval on behalf of the Community.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 September 1987.
For the CouncilThe PresidentB. HAARDER
